epd_metadata.declaration_owner: Holcim México Operaciones, S.A. de C.V.

product_description.company_description: Holcim Mexico Operaciones SA de CV produces and markets cement, ready-mix concrete, and other products and services for construction.
product_description.product_scope: This LCA is a cradle-to-gate study, and therefore, stages extending beyond the plant gate are not included.

lca_information.study_goal: To comply with the procedures for creating a Type III environmental product declaration (EPD) and publish the EPD for public review.
lca_information.data_sources: Primary data from Holcim México Operaciones, S.A. de C.V. and ecoinvent V3.6 database.
lca_information.cut_off_criteria: Minimum of 95% of the total inflows (mass and energy) to the upstream and core modules.

carbon_emission_context.global_warming_potential: GWP is measured in kg CO2 equivalent.

recycled_materials_handling.raw_material_recycled_content: Various materials have post-industrial and post-consumer content with assumed material losses.
